title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node & browsers).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; install via pip and chat with local models in a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, retrieval, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model (no external API keys).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builder-style API and streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration so you can use Ollama models in production pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that injects an Ollama service for TypeScript back-ends.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with .NET 8 and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST endpoints for chatting with Ollama models; includes admin UI.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Community-maintained collection of unofficial SDKs (Go, Ruby, PHP, Swift).

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize notes or generate text with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate for Ollama’s REST API with tokio streaming support.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Self-host a Telegram bot that answers users via any Ollama model.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot that brings local LLM power to your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI built with Qt6 and C++ for chatting with Ollama models offline.
